Player name\codename: Player's positions. They are defined as the point guard (PG), the shooting guard (SG), the small forward (SF), the power forward (PF), and the center (C).
Player's age.
Team
Games. The number of games a player or team played where a specified criteria occured.
Games Started
Minutes Played
Points. The number of points scored.
True Shooting Percentage. A shooting percentage that factors in the value of three-point field goals and free throws in addition to conventional two-point.
Free Throws Made. The number of free throws that a player or team has made.
Free Throws Attempted. The number of free throws that a player or team has attempted.
Free Throw Percentage. The percentage of free throw attempts that a player or team has made.
Field Goals Made. The number of field goals that a player or team has made. This includes both 2 pointers and 3 pointers.
Field Goals Attempted. The number of field goals that a player or team has attempted. This includes both 2 pointers and 3 pointers.
Field Goal Percentage. The percentage of field goal attempts that a player makes.
3 Point Field Goals Made. The number of 3 point field goals that a player or team has made.
3 Point Field Goals Attempted. The number of 3 point field goals that a player or team has attempted.
3 Point Field Goal Percentage. The percentage of 3 point field goal attempts that a player makes.
2 Point Field Goals Made. The number of 2 point field goals that a player or team has made.
2 Point Field Goals Attempted. The number of 2 point field goals that a player or team has attempted.
2 Point Field Goal Percentage. The percentage of 2 point field goal attempts that a player makes.
Offensive Rebounds. The number of rebounds a player or team has collected while they were on offense.
Offensive Rebounding Percentage. The percentage of available offensive rebounds a player or team obtains while on the floor.
Defensive Rebounds. The number of rebounds a player or team has collected while they were on defense.
Defensive Rebounding Percentage. The percentage of available defensive rebounds a player or team obtains while on the floor.
Total Rebounds
Total Rebound Percentage
Assists. The number of assists -- passes that lead directly to a made basket -- by a player.
Assist Percentage. The percentage of teammate field goals a player assisted on while he was on the floor.
Steals. Number of times a defensive player or team takes the ball from a player on offense, causing a turnover.
Steals Percentage. The percentage of a team's steals that a player has while on the court.
Blocks. A block occurs when an offensive player attempts a shot, and the defense player tips the ball, blocking their chance to score.
Block Percentage. The percentage of a team's blocks that a player has while on the court.
Turnovers. A turnover occurs when the player or team on offense loses the ball to the defense.
Turnover Percentage. Percentage of plays that end in a player or team's turnover.
Usage Percentage. The percentage of team plays used by a player when he is on the floor.
Offensive Win Shares. Share of wins a player contributes to their team from offense.
Defensive Win Shares. Share of wins a player contributes to their team from defense.
Win Shares. An estimate of the total number of wins contributed by a player.
Win Shares Per 48 Minutes. An estimate of the number of wins contributed by the player per 48 minutes (league average is approximately 0.100).
Box Plus/Minus. A box score estimate of the points per 100 possessions that a player contributed above a league-average player, translated to an average team.

Value Over Replacement Player. A box score estimate of the points per 100 TEAM possessions that a player contributed above a replacement-level (-2.0) player, translated to an average team and prorated to an 82-game season. Multiply by 2.70 to convert to wins over replacement.
Effective Field Goal Percentage. Measures field goal percentage adjusting for made 3-point field goals being 1.5 times more valuable than made 2-point field.
Personal Fouls. The number of personal fouls a player or team committed.
